price: Isipo kuwa kifo chetu cha kwanza? Wala sisi hatutaadhibiwa.
arabic: إِلَّا مَوۡتَتَنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
footnotes: Je! Sisi tutakaa milele tukineemeka katika Pepo, wala hatufi kabisa isipo kuwa kule kufa kwetu mara ya kwanza duniani, na wala hatuadhibiwi baada ya kwisha ingia Peponi?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: illā mawtatanā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
